discussion_comments.comment_body: Set this correctly before calling the CLI so the proper version of React gets loaded (https://github.com/remix-run/react-router/issues/12078)

commented_code:
format: "esm",
         sourcemap: !PRETTY,
         banner: createBanner("React Router", version),
+        paths: {
+          "react-router": "./index.mjs",
+        },

discussion_comments.commented_code:
@@ -69,6 +69,9 @@ module.exports = function rollup() {
         format: "esm",
         sourcemap: !PRETTY,
         banner: createBanner("React Router", version),
+        paths: {
+          "react-router": "./index.mjs",
+        },
discussion_comments.comment_body: we rewrite the imports of `react-router` in the dom-export build to the most appropriate react-router entrypoint.
